skills.name: Fake Attack
skills.description: Performs an unpredictable attack and decreases the target's Attack Power for 1 turn. This attack will also increase the target's chance of landing a Glancing Hit for 1 turn if this attack lands as a Critical Hit.

skill_effect.name: Glancing Hit
skill_effect.description: Accuracy is reduced by 50% and the chance for the monster to land a Glancing Hit of reduced damage will increase.

skills.name: Angry Wave
skills.description: Attacks all enemies 2 times with waves of water. Each attack has a 30% chance to decrease the target's Attack Speed for 2 turns. If the target already suffers an Attack Speed reduction effect, this attack will stun them for 1 turn.
skills.level_progress_description:
Damage +5%
Effect Rate +10%
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +10%
Damage +10%
Cooltime Turn -1

skill_effect.name: AOE
skill_effect.description: Applies skill to more than one target

skill_effect.name: Multiple Hits
skill_effect.description: Attack hits more than 1 time per use.

skill_effect.name: Stun
skill_effect.description: Enemy is stunned and immobilized for a number of turns

skills.name: Secret Visit
skills.description: Stuns the enemy with the highest Attack Bar for 1 turn, removes the weakening effects on you, and recovers 15% HP. Also your Attack Speed will be increased and you will recover 15% HP per turn for 2 turns.

skill_effect.name: Self-Heal
skill_effect.description: Heal that affects only the monster who cast the skill

skill_effect.name: Stun
skill_effect.description: Enemy is stunned and immobilized for a number of turns

skills.multiplier_formula: 0.15*<mark data-toggle="tooltip" data-placement="top" title="Attacker's HP in raw hit points">MAX HP</mark>
